mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `CBBA` cb WHERE cb.CBBA06 = 0 AND cb.CBBA12 = 0 AND cb.CBBA08 = #{goodsId} AND cb.CBBA15 <= #{poritiry} AND cb.CBBA01 != #{cbba01} ORDER BY cb.CBBA15 DESC
SELECT * FROM CBBA c WHERE c.CBBA08 = #{goodsId} AND c.CBBA06 =0 AND c.CBBA12= 0 order by c.CBBA15 DESC

SELECT ba.CBBA15 as priority, ba.CBBA01 as id, ba.CBBA07 as orderNo, pb.CBPB12 as model, pb.CBPB08 as description, ba.CBBA09 as orderQty, ba.CBBA13 as makeQty, ba.CBBA12 as status, ba.CBBA10 as orderType, ba.CBBA11 as ShippedQty, pb.CBPB01 as goodsId, pb.CBPB10 as brand FROM `CBBA` ba LEFT JOIN CBPB pb ON pb.CBPB01 = ba.CBBA08 WHERE ba.CBBA06 = 0
AND ba.CBBA07 like concat('%', #{orderNo}, '%')
AND pb.CBPB12 like concat('%', #{model}, '%')
AND ba.CBBA12 = #{status}
order by ba.CBBA02 DESC

select
from `CBBA` where CBBA01 = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} for update
